programme.title: Dave Gorman: Terms and Conditions Apply
programme.desc: Using his trademark, powerpoint-comedy and mischievous games, Dave invites David O'Doherty, Rose Matafeo and Ed Gamble to help him make sense of the world.

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.sub-title: Have I Got a Bit More 2018 News for You
programme.desc: An extended compilation of the most memorable news stories of 2018, with captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop, and assorted hosts and special guests from the worlds of comedy, journalism and current affairs.

programme.title: Dave Gorman: Modern Life Is Goodish
programme.desc: Dave takes a sledgehammer to an irksome printer, and Christine Hamilton receives a gift.

programme.title: Zapped
programme.desc: Herman gives The Jug And The Other Jug a relaunch. Meanwhile, the deadly disease Woodpox is sweeping through Munty, and only Howell has the cure.

programme.title: Zapped
programme.desc: Brian has found the magical amulet that can potentially send him home - but it doesn't work. Howell tricks him into getting a book from the oddly menacing Munty Library.

programme.title: Zapped
programme.desc: In the final episode, Brian joins the Munty Reserve forces, while Barbara and Steg find their own groups to enlist with.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: The Architecture The Railways Built
programme.desc: Tim Dunn visits the Ffestiniog in North Wales originally built to transport slate from mountain to coast and learns about Amsterdam Centraal.

programme.title: VE Day: Countdown to Peace
programme.desc: This compelling documentary celebrates the approaching 75th Anniversary of freedom and peace in Europe.

programme.title: Private Lives of the Monarchs
programme.sub-title: George III and the Prince Regent
programme.desc: Tracy Borman investigates the troubled relationship between George III and his eldest son, and the impact the king's declining mental health had on the prince.

programme.title: Private Lives of the Monarchs
programme.desc: The life of Louis XIV, revealing the unpleasant truth behind the grandeur of the Palace of Versailles, and exploring the king's love life and unusual fashion sense.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Trial & Retribution
programme.desc: Back on the murder squad, Pat is asked to investigate when a young mother of two, Diane Leach, is abducted from a local wood. The confession of a local sex offender complicates matters, as Pat looks into the possibility that the father of a young protege of the woman may be responsible for her disappearance. Meanwhile, Walker has worries of his own, as his ex-wife Lyn is dating an abusive, unstable man, who turns into a manic-obsessive when she decides to leave him.

programme.title: Hetty Wainthropp Investigates
programme.sub-title: A Rose by Any Other Name
programme.desc: A middle-aged widow's family become convinced a photographer is only marrying her for money and ask Hetty to investigate. Given a week to probe his past and find out whether he's a gold-digging cad or a 24-carat gentleman, the unlikely sleuth unearths some extremely interesting facts. Drama based on the novel by David Cook, starring Patricia Routledge and Derek Benfield.

programme.title: Gangster Squad (2013)
programme.desc: A New York gangster brings his criminal organisation to Los Angeles in 1949, rapidly seizing control of the city's criminal activity and corrupting the authorities to ensure no one stands up to him. The chief of police discreetly sets up a secret task force with the intention of bringing the mobster to justice. Crime thriller, starring Josh Brolin, Ryan Gosling and Sean Penn.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Babushka
programme.desc: Game show hosted by Rylan Clark-Neal in which contestants answer questions to get the chance to open a set of giant Russian nesting dolls, with some empty and others containing prizes up to Â£10,000

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Don't Stop The 00's Party: Top 50
programme.desc: Your essential guide to the biggest party starting tracks of the noughties! We've only got space for the party hits that really matter.

programme.title: Late Night Magic
programme.desc: We're taking you all the way through the night with soem of the best tracks of all time.

programme.title: Kisstory: Old Skool & Anthems
programme.desc: It's time to go back in time with KISSTORY! The biggest old skool anthems ever from your favourite artists.

programme.title: Up All Night! Kiss Beats
programme.desc: Let the world sleep! But here at Kiss we are still up, still delivering the finest beats for your nocturnal jam.

programme.title: Chart Hits & New Vids
programme.desc: We've got all the hits that are storming the charts right now, along with some brand new releases from your favourite and new artists.

programme.title: All The Hits, All Night
programme.desc: Non-stop hits to see you all the way through the night.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Desperate for a find, the Bushmen gamble on a dangerous mining method deep below ground. In Lightning Ridge an injury causes The Bros a serious setback.

programme.title: Jungle Gold
programme.desc: George and Scott are convinced there is a potential $1.5million of gold to be mined on their claim, but wonder if their neighbours will allow them to get it out of the ground.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob Nelson investigates rumours of secret underground escape route used by infamous gangster Al Capone. Plus, mysterious earthen mounds in Washington State.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: Paul Jr and Vinnie venture into enemy territory to pick up the Black Widow bike, while Paul Sr is frustrated he has not seen Mikey since the settlement.

programme.title: World's Top 5
programme.desc: Five of the world's most impressive cranes are pitted against one another in a variety of key categories.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs
programme.desc: Mike Rowe experiences work in the steel industry when he visits a mill in St Louis.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: The documentary exploring the manufacturing processes behind everyday objects returns, turning attention to leather basketballs, wood panel canvases and shoelaces.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: More everyday items are placed under the microscope, as the manufacturing processes behind the production of Asian bowls and walking canes are detailed.

programme.title: Serial Psyche
programme.desc: Experts examine the backgrounds of some of history's most notorious serial killers. They explore the crimes and psychology of Peter Sutcliffe and Jeffrey Dahmer..

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: How technology such as mobile phones, CCTV and cashpoints can help solve murder investigations.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: Twenty-four-year old Nathan Trapuzzano is shot dead during his morning walk, leaving his pregnant wife a widow. Can CCTV footage help police track down the killer?.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The New Year's Eve 2000 murders of Carl and JoAnna Dutcher and their 15-year-old grandson Tony, in the tiny Rocky Mountain outpost of Guffey. It transpired a school friend of Tony's, Scott Grimes, committed the act because he felt pressured by an older peer group with which he was associated.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: A courier's burning body is found in an alley and officers uncover a crime ring run by a violent drug baron who intimidated his men into silence.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Boris the boar has been abandoned without food or water in disgusting conditions. The race is on to free him and give him a better life.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Dr Chris Brown treats a tiger with toothache and checks on some puppies that will be trained into guide dogs. Meanwhile, Lisa battles to save a much-loved Pomeranian.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Dr Chris Brown delivers a litter of 10 assistance-dog puppies and helps a kitten in a critical condition after a freak accident. Plus, a snake is seriously injured.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Three brides search for the perfect dress, including Elona, who has recently overcome huge obstacles, and Courtney, who brings along her mother to help.
